page.title: 05Modernisation & Unemployment
page.content: The many jobs on the farms are reasonably secure because this is an arable area and this year it is the dairy farms which have had to cut their production.At Langford however over the past three years,there have been great changes.Some people in Langford have spent all their lives working for the Essex Water Works.The most building to go on in the village this century was for houses for water workers.Now Langfords pumping is being computerised.{30}men mostly aged around 50 have lost their jobs in the last two years and more are due to lose them this next year.Langford also used to have 5 chemical laboratories to test local water now these are being cut to two.This is a great blow to the village but the workers will not have to lose their homes,they are being given the chance to buy them.
